description.en: A Miqo'te conjurer and a Scion of the Seventh Dawn who is not only capable of advanced magic but also well-versed in ancient language and lore. Wise and mysterious、 she is an expert in conjury─the art of healing. She is a woman of strong convictions、 but that's also what makes her stubborn from time to time.
description.jp:
エオルゼアで活動する組織「暁の血盟」
に属するミコッテ族の賢人。高度な魔法
を操り 古代語や伝承などに精通した
知的でミステリアスな人物で 癒しの魔
法である「幻術」のエキスパート。強い
信念を持っているが それ故に頑固な面
もちらほら。

jp.text: 冒険者として\n十分な素質の持ち主ね
あら……\n案外 アタリだったのかも？
フフ……\nこれは思わぬ収穫もあったものね
誇り高きヤ族のミコッテを\nナメないことね
この辺りのエーテルの流れを\n調査している博物学者よ
本当に無事でよかった
これが終わったらお仕置きね
黙ってぶちのめす\nそれだけよ

gl.text: You have demonstrated all of the qualities we seek in an adventurer.
I have missed my mark. ...Or perhaps not.
Well、 well... This has been a day of unexpected revelations.
Do not think me bested so easily!
I am...a naturalist of sorts、 surveying the aether.
We are a family、 are we not?
Next time、 have a care what you wish for.
Less provoking and more pummeling、 if you would be so kind!

desc.en: Magic attack\nSteals enemy's BRV

desc.en: Slightly raises Defense when BRV is at least 50%.
desc.gl: Moderately raises DEF while BRV is at least 50% of MAX
desc.jp: 自身のBRVが最大BRVの50％以上の時\n自身の防御力を中アップ

short_desc.gl: BRV Guard Up: Raises DEF
short_desc.jp: BRVガードアップ：防御力がアップ

name.jp: ストーンエクステンド

desc.en:
Increases Stone's max uses by 2.
Increases its number of hits to 2.
Moderately raises its total potency.
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% of Max BRV.
Grants BRV Regen for 5 turns.
Turns Stone to Stone+ when BRV is over 30% Max BRV.
Stone+ raises BRV based on Initial BRV before the BRV hits, triggers an HP attack after use and has lower Action Delay.
Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ after using Stone or Stone+.
BRV Attack+ is a 1-HIT magic BRV attack that raises BRV based on Initial BRV.
desc.gl:
Stone use +2

When using Stone:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Self: 5 turns BRV Regen

While BRV at least 30% of MAX:
• Stone becomes Stone+ (increases BRV based on INT BRV before BRV attack; triggers additional HP attack after use; high turn rate)

After using Stone, Stone+:
• BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (increases BRV based on INT BRV; magic BRV attack; moderately increased BRV damage) for 5 turns
desc.jp:
「ストーン」の使用回数＋2

「ストーン」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も中アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・自身に5ACTION「BRVリジェネ」付与

自身のBRVが最大BRVの30％以上の時
「ストーン」が「ストーン＋」に変化し
以下の効果が追加
・BRV攻撃前に自身に
　自身の初期BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
・使用後 追加HP攻撃が発動
・行動負荷が低い

「ストーン」「ストーン＋」使用後 5ACTION
通常「BRV攻撃」が以下の「BRV攻撃＋」に変化
・BRV攻撃前
　自身に自身の初期BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
・BRV威力中アップ

short_desc.gl: Stone Extension: Boost to Stone
short_desc.jp: ストーンエクステンド：「ストーン」の性能アップ

name.jp: バフベースブーストアップ

desc.en: Moderately raises Initial BRV and greatly raises Max BRV while buffed.
desc.gl: Moderately raises INT BRV, largely raises MAX BRV with active buffs
desc.jp: 自身に強化効果が付与されている時\n自身の初期BRV中アップと最大BRV大アップ

short_desc.gl: Buffed Initial Boost: Raises INT BRV, MAX BRV
short_desc.jp: バフベースブーストアップ：初期BRVと最大BRVがアップ

name.jp: メディカラエクステンド

desc.en: Raises BRV based on Initial BRV before applying the BRV multiplier.\nSlightly raises the BRV multiplier.\nGrants Medium Max BRV Up to all allies and slightly raises the BRV Gain granted by Medica II.
desc.gl:
When using Medica II:

name.jp: ストーンエクステンド

desc.gl:
Stone use +2

When using Stone:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Self: 5 turns BRV Regen

While BRV at least 30% of MAX:
• Stone becomes Stone+ (increases BRV based on INT BRV before BRV attack; triggers additional HP attack after use; high turn rate)

After using Stone, Stone+:
• BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (increases BRV based on INT BRV; magic BRV attack; moderately increased BRV damage) for 5 turns
desc.jp:
「ストーン」の使用回数＋2

「ストーン」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も中アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・自身に5ACTION「BRVリジェネ」付与

自身のBRVが最大BRVの30％以上の時
「ストーン」が「ストーン＋」に変化し
以下の効果が追加
・BRV攻撃前に自身に
　自身の初期BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
・使用後 追加HP攻撃が発動
・行動負荷が低い

「ストーン」「ストーン＋」使用後 5ACTION
通常「BRV攻撃」が以下の「BRV攻撃＋」に変化
・BRV攻撃前
　自身に自身の初期BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
・BRV威力中アップ

desc.en:
Slightly raises recast speed of 「Pulse of Life」

When using 「Pulse of Life」:
- No Action Delay
- Does not increase turn count
- Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

After using 「Pulse of Life」:
- Turns 「HP Attack」, 「HP Attack+」 into 「HP Attack++」
　∟ Raises BRV based on Initial BRV before the HP attack
　∟ Gained BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV

Prevents KO if HP is at least 50% of Max HP and leaves HP value at 1
desc.gl:
Slightly raises recast speed of Pulse of Life

When using Pulse of Life:
 • Turn rate becomes instantaneous
 • Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support

After using Pulse of Life:
 • HP Attack, HP Attack+ become HP Attack++ (increases BRV based on INT BRV, before HP attack; increased BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%) for 9 turns

Enemy attacks will not reduce HP below 1 while own HP is at least 50% of MAX

リキャストスピードを小アップ

敵の攻撃でHPダメージを受けても必ず1残る
